pages.privacy: PetPaw Emporium: Your One-Stop Shop for Pet Supplies in India | Privacy Policy Home What we offer About us Categories Products Reviews Contact us Privacy Policy At PetPaw Emporium, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website or engage with our services. We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and shipping address when you place an order or sign up for our newsletter. This information is used solely for the purpose of processing your orders and keeping you informed about our latest products and promotions. We utilize industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties without your consent. By using our website and services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at petpawemporium@gmail.com. This Privacy Policy is subject to change without notice. Please review this page periodically for updates. Providing top-quality pet supplies and accessories to keep your furry friends happy and healthy. pages.thank: PetPaw Emporium: Your One-Stop Shop for Pet Supplies in India | Thank you Thank you for choosing PetPaw Emporium We are deeply grateful for your trust and support. At PetPaw Emporium, we are committed to providing exceptional products and services to ensure the well-being and happiness of your beloved pets. Whether you're shopping for premium pet food, grooming essentials, or fun toys, we strive to offer the best selection and the highest quality items.
